Module org.screen_time_tracker.screen_time_tracker
Package org.screen_time_tracker.screen_time_tracker.Model.User

Interface IUsersDetails

All Known Implementing Classes:
SQLiteUserDAO
public interface IUsersDetails
This interface is responsible for defining the methods associated with the user Particularly around CRUD operations involving the user

    • IsPasswordCorrect

      boolean IsPasswordCorrect(String Password)
      This method is used to verify the users Password to make sure its the correct length minimum length of 8 characters contains 1 special character contains 1 captical contains at least one number
      Parameters:
      Password - : The password to be verified
      Returns:
      true if the password meets the security requirements, false otherwise

    • IsEmailCorrect

      boolean IsEmailCorrect(String email)
      This method verify the users email making sure it contains a @ symbol a .com/.au or similar to verify the details are valid
      Parameters:
      email - : The email to be verified
      Returns:
      true if the email format is correct, false otherwise

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      true if the user exists in the db
